price: 67. Waxay leeyihiin intaa kaddib cabbitaan isku dhaf kulul ah oo karaya.
arabic: ثُمَّ إِنَّ لَهُمۡ عَلَيۡهَا لَشَوۡبٗا مِّنۡ حَمِيمٖ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: thumma inna lahum ʿalayhā lashawban min ḥamīmin
